Articles.Content:
i dont really like the KSP i wish it was like Real life but i know that RSS and RO Exist but they are so outdated so if somebody could actually UPDATE Them that would be good for me and the Community(i still like the game but the only thing thats off is Realism)

Edited August 31, 2018 by Kroslev Kerman

You did not read that, did you

Also if you want realism in full form, there is Orbiter Sim.

AFAIK RO/RSS is already updated to 1.3.1.Thats not really ancient history - I personally still am only KSP 1.3.0. 

Also I'm not quite sure what the problem is with going back a version if you really want to play with RO/RSS.

I agree -- effectively, the only things 1.4.* added over 1.3.1 were parachutes for Kerbals, and the ability to install the Making History add-on (which is mostly parts, plus the Mission Designer).

RSS/RO for 1.3.1 has easily ten times as many historical parts as Making History, accurately statted, plus Real Fuels and Real Plume which make a hypergolic engine work and look different from a kerolox, ethylox, or hydrolox engine (hypergolics have relatively poor performance, but won't boil off while you wait nine months on a Hohmann transfer to Mars).  The underlying game could be considered the most stable version of KSP to date.  It's not perfect; at present, RP-1 is still a work in progress, the runway (and hence SPH) is virtually useless (not sure if it's terrain seams or something else, but it's like running over a bunch of low curbs or speed bumps), there are bugs related to FAI records when flying aircraft, and some problems switching to Map View while under thrust.  The game and mod suite are very playable, however, especially if you're mostly interested in the history of spaceflight. which includes very few actual spaceplanes.

People have already made some good points here. But @Kroslev Kerman, I think perhaps you underestimate the amount of work that RSS/RO takes to keep up to date. It is really a huge project, and done by volunteers who are not paid for all of that work.

We really should be thanking them rather than complaining, don't you think? We owe them a lot. 

(Also, I moved the thread to Add-on Discussions)
RSS is updated and RO can't be updated until FAR is, you'll need to wait.
